original_text: And her mother in law said unto her, Where hast thou gleaned to day? and where wroughtest thou? blessed be he that did take knowledge of thee. And she shewed her mother in law with whom she had wrought, and said, The man's name with whom I wrought to day is Boaz.
korean_text: 시어머니가 그에게 이르되 오늘 어디서 주웠느냐 어디서 일을 하였느냐 너를 돌본 자에게 복이 있기를 원하노라 하니 룻이 누구에게서 일했는지를 시어머니에게 알게 하여 이르되 오늘 일하게 한 사람의 이름은 보아스니이다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And her mother in law said unto her
Where hast thou gleaned to day?
blessed be he that did take knowledge of thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네게 관심을 보인 그가 복을 받으리로다

sentences.original_text: And she shewed her mother in law
The man's name with whom I wrought to day
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 오늘 함께 일한 그 사람의 이름은
